column3: A new car is not going to change your life.
Adults are locked into car payments and divorces and work. They haven't got time to think fresh.

You don't, after all, stick to your car, or computer, or iPod, when better ones appear.

Kids don't really care what your car is like or how big their house is. All they really care about is that you are around.
